scripts.test: npx --yes firebase-tools emulators:exec --only firestore --project asset-gen-local "bash -lc '[ -x .venv/bin/python ] && .venv/bin/python -m pytest -q || { command -v python3.12 >/dev/null 2>&1 && python3.12 -m pytest -q || python3 -m pytest -q; }'"
scripts.test:firestore: npx --yes firebase-tools emulators:exec --only firestore --project asset-gen-local "bash -lc '[ -x .venv/bin/python ] && .venv/bin/python -m pytest -q || { command -v python3.12 >/dev/null 2>&1 && python3.12 -m pytest -q || python3 -m pytest -q; }'"
scripts.openapi:generate: bash -lc 'if [ -x .venv/bin/python ]; then PY_BIN=.venv/bin/python; else PY_BIN=${PYTHON:-python3.12}; command -v "$PY_BIN" >/dev/null 2>&1 || PY_BIN=python3; fi; "$PY_BIN" scripts/export_openapi.py' && openapi-typescript build/openapi.json --output types/generated/assetgen.ts
